author: mmusich
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunII simulation
- **RunII Ideal scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_design_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v6) as [80X_mcRun2_design_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v6/80X_mcRun2_design_v5): 
  - updated HcalParameters and Sim geometry to handle 1x1 HF TPs
- **RunII CRAFT scenario** : [80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v4) as [80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v4/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5): 
  - updated HcalParameters and Sim geometry to handle 1x1 HF TPs
- **RunII Asymptotic scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v6) as [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v6/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5): 
  - updated HcalParameters and Sim geometry to handle 1x1 HF TPs
- **RunII Startup scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_startup_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v6) as [80X_mcRun2_startup_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v6/80X_mcRun2_startup_v5): 
  - updated HcalParameters and Sim geometry to handle 1x1 HF TPs
- **RunII Heavy Ions scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v5) as [80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v4) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v5/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v4): 
  - updated HcalParameters and Sim geometry to handle 1x1 HF TPs
## RunII data
- **RunII HLTHI processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v6) as [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v6/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v3): 
  - updated HcalParameters to handle 1x1 HF TPs
  - updated Hcal e-maps (unlabeled and full) for unpacking of uTCA FEDs in HBHE
- **RunII HLT relval processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v3) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v3/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v1): 
  - updated HcalParameters to handle 1x1 HF TPs
  - udated Hcal e-maps (unlabeled and full) for unpacking of uTCA FEDs in HBHE
- **RunII HLT processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v6) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v6/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v3): 
  - updated HcalParameters to handle 1x1 HF TPs
  - udated Hcal e-maps (unlabeled and full) for unpacking of uTCA FEDs in HBHE
- **RunII Offline processing** : [80X_dataRun2_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v8) as [80X_dataRun2_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v8/80X_dataRun2_v6): 
  - updated HcalParameters to handle 1x1 HF TPs
- **RunII Offline relval processing** : [80X_dataRun2_relval_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v3) as [80X_dataRun2_relval_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v3/80X_dataRun2_relval_v1): 
  - updated HcalParameters to handle 1x1 HF TPs
title: Adding 1x1 HF trigger primitives in Hcal Geometry tags
